attributes.action: change building regulations to ensure that by the year 2015 all new build dwellings incorporate low maintenance bell towers thus ensuring equality for all.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel it important that we recognise that when a bell tower is built it is done using low maintenance products thus ensuring that costs are kept low over the lifetime of said bell tower and changing building regulations would ensure this occurred.
